DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and tolerability of single and multiple doses of VAK694 in healthy volunteers and otherwise healthy volunteers with a history of allergies.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability of Single and Multiple Doses of VAK694 in Healthy and Atopic Subjects
DOC.criteria: History of allergic rhinitis (Part 2 only) Very low or high body weight Heavy or recent smoker Exposure to human monoclonal antibodies Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
